ip: , “bunsuranan”. This document, here it's written the making of sky/heaven and of land, the migpuunan of person, and the bunsuranan of sale and suffering here of world. Nasulat again here the story concerning the people chosen by God and the carrying din them there to inged promised din them.

meta.ip: Divided of two this the document:

1.) The making of world and the story concerning the people. Kayi egkabasa the story concerning Adan and ki Iba, the concerning Kain and ki Abil, and the concerning Noah and the pegsipuk of water, and the concerning the matikang house there to Babil.

2.) The story concerning the first elders of Israilita. Abraham the first elder of Israilita neyimu mabantug tenged of faith and trusting din and of obedience din of suhu of God. Egpakasinundul also the story concerning the anak din Isaac, and the apu din Yacob (named ded also ki Israel), and the ten and two (12) anak of Yacob iyan migpuunan of ten and two (12) descendants of Israel. Nahuhud also here the concerning the anak of Yacob Husi and the what happened kandin iyan impuunan of nekeendiye of Egypt Yacob other of children din.

Egkabasa ta again here the story concerning the various people nabuhal-buhal here of ampew of land and migmannenasud e. Labew of all, nahuhud here the large work of God making of sky/heaven and land and of all nakatahu here.

There in final of story, egkahuhud the without ending promise of God of people din. Kene eglingawan of God the promise din and not din iya egbalaharen the people din because egpanuluen and egbulihan din them. And/Now sikandin the eggukum and eglegpad of all eggimu of bad.

io1: The making of God of sky/heaven and of world
The bunsuranan of sale and of suffering
The story ki Adan going to ki Noah
Noah and the pegsipuk of water
The matikang house there to Babil
The story ki Sim going to ki Abraham
The elders of me Hebrews: Abraham, Isaac, and Yacob
The me Hebrews there to Egypt

contents: In the beginning, Elohim created the heavens and the earth.

contents: The earth was formless and empty and darkness covered the surface of the depths and the Spirit of Elohim was hovering over the surface of the waters.
